title: Apply for a digital tachograph company smart card

details.description: Contact DVLA to get a digital tachograph company smart card - change, replace, renew a card
details.body:
Apply to DVLA for a digital tachograph company smart card.

As an operator, you need a card to download data from the digital tachographs in your vehicles.

How to apply

Complete application form D779B and post it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

Download ‘D779B - Application for a digital tachograph company card’ (PDF, 120KB)

You can also use this form to:

  • change the name or address on your cards
  • replace lost, stolen or damaged cards
  • renew expired cards

By post

You can request an ‘ST2A’ application pack in the post.

By phone

Call DVLA for an ‘ST2A’ application pack.

DVLA
0300 790 6109

Northern Ireland

In Northern Ireland you can get application forms for company cards from the Driver & Vehicle Agency (DVA).

DVA licensing enquiries
dvlni@doeni.gov.uk
0845 402 4000

Visit nidirect for more information.
